title: Foundation: Understand Marketing & Master the Basics
description: A degree in Marketing or a related field is helpful, but not essential. The key is to learn the fundamentals of digital marketing channels. Get certified with free courses from Google and HubSpot to build a strong theoretical base.

title: Specialize and Gain Practical Experience
description: Choose one or two areas to specialize in (e.g., SEO, Google Ads, Social Media). Offer your services for free or a low cost to small businesses or NGOs to build a portfolio of real-world results and case studies.
qualifications: A portfolio with measurable results (e.g., increased traffic, lead generation)

title: Digital Marketing Executive / Specialist
description: Join a digital marketing agency or a corporate marketing team. You'll be responsible for executing campaigns in your area of specialization, analyzing data, and reporting on performance to clients or managers.

title: Digital Marketing Manager
description: Move from execution to strategy. As a manager, you will develop the overall digital marketing strategy for a brand, manage budgets across different channels, lead a team of specialists, and be responsible for achieving key business objectives (KPIs).
qualifications: A strong track record of successful, data-driven campaigns
institutes: All major companies with a strong digital presence

title: Head of Digital / Performance Marketing Lead
description: In a senior leadership role, you oversee the entire digital marketing function and its impact on the company's revenue. This is a highly strategic, data-driven role focused on growth, market share, and profitability.
qualifications: Extensive experience and a portfolio of growth metrics
